createTables.T: create table ?SERVERNAME?_StmtStat ( StmtID numeric(14) identity not null, BootID int not null, KPID int not null, SPID int not null, BatchID int not null, StartTime datetime not null, EndTime datetime null, ExactStat char(1) not null, Login varchar(30)null, Application varchar(30)null, ClientHost varchar(30)null, ClientIP varchar(24)null, ClientOSPID varchar(30)null, DBID int not null, ProcName varchar(30) null, PlanID int not null, ContextID int not null, LineNumber int not null, CpuTime int not null, WaitTime int not null, MemUsageKB int not null, PhysicalReads int not null, LogicalReads int not null, PagesModified int not null, PacketsSent int not null, PacketsReceived int not null, NetworkPacketSize int not null, PlansAltered int not null, RowsAffected int null ) lock datapages with identity_gap=10

create table ?SERVERNAME?_StmtSQL ( Timestamp datetime not null, BootID int not null, KPID int not null, SPID int not null, BatchID int not null, LineNumber int null, SequenceInLine int not null, SQLText varchar(255) null ) lock datapages
create table ?SERVERNAME?_StmtPlan ( StmtID numeric(14) not null, Sequence int not null, SQLPlan varchar(255) null ) lock datapages

create table ?SERVERNAME?_StmtObj ( StmtID numeric(14) not null, DBName varchar(30) null, OwnerUserID int not null, ObjectName varchar(30) null, ObjectType varchar(30) null, IndexID int not null, LogicalReads int not null, PhysicalReads int not null, PhysicalAPFReads int not null, TableSize int not null ) lock datapages

createIndexes.I: create index idx on ?SERVERNAME?_StmtStat (StartTime, BootID, KPID, SPID, BatchID )
create index idx1 on ?SERVERNAME?_StmtSQL (Timestamp, KPID, SPID)

purge.P: declare @minStmtID numeric(14) select @minStmtID=min(StmtID) FROM ?SERVERNAME?_StmtStat delete ?SERVERNAME?_StmtPlan where StmtID < @minStmtID
declare @minStmtID numeric(14) select @minStmtID=min(StmtID) FROM ?SERVERNAME?_StmtStat delete ?SERVERNAME?_StmtObj where StmtID < @minStmtID
